name: Chained Escape
summary:
❗️The Escalation Update is Here!❗️
Chained Escape just raised the stakes with the all new Escalation Update. 

Challenge your friends in an all new VS Mode and see who comes out on top! Or work together and utilize the brand new skill system to reach the end. 

And that's not all! There's also new cosmetics, improved social features, a massive stage overhaul, and a big transition to premium.

This is a large scale breakout like never before!

⛓️ Linked by Chains, Bound by Fate ⛓️
"Chained Escape" is an...
